description: This spicy tray bake is a complete and delicious one pan dinner, with low effort and very little washing up needed.
keywords: Bake,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Harissa Lamb, Cauliflower & Chickpea Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs harissa paste, skinned, deseeded and chopped
1 large red onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the oil, harissa, garlic and lemon juice and half the zest together in a large bowl. Tip in the cauliflower and red onion in and mix well to coat.
Use a slotted spoon to place the cauliflower and red onion in a large roasting tin and roast for 10 minutes.
Add the lamb fillet to the marinade, coat all sides and add it to the roasting tin on top of the vegetables. Roast for another 20 minutes.
Mix the yoghurt, coriander and lemon zest in a small bowl. Remove the roasting tin from the oven, place the lamb on a chopping board and cover with foil. Leave to rest.
Add the drained chickpeas to the roasting tin and return to the oven for 57 minutes.
Slice the lamb and serve with cauliflower, onion and chickpea mix and a dollop of yoghurt.
